t: Amazon will order 100,000 electric delivery vans from EV startup Rivian, Jeff Bezos says | The Verge
s: September 19, 2019 - Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos said the company has placed an order for 100,000 electric delivery vans from Michigan-based startup Rivian. The announcement came during an event on Thursday in Washington, DC where Bezos unveiled Amazon’s sweeping plan to tackle climate change.
